title: The Reflection
description: To rectify the tragic loss of his eldest daughter Rebecca, Doctor Johnathan Grunge searched for solutions through his genetic studies. It was time for Doctor Grunge to unveil his years of research to the public domain. He was never aware of the full implications of his experiments. His focus was not shifted away from his DNA program, to the monster he created in the dark. The monster that kept him sleepless at night... The monster that lurked over his family...
author: T.L.J. Heaven
